attributes.action: prevent the Norwich City Council from taking on unitary status over the surrounding area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: currently Norwich City Council only has juristiction over the City area, but there are plans which give them control over the surrounding councils such as Broadland. We are opposed as most of the councils due to be taken over are more efficient than Norwich City Council, and there would also be an increase in council taxes. We therefore propose that should Norwich City Council wish to gain unitary status it should first increase its efficiency and constituent satisfaction.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "prevent the Norwich City Council from taking on unitary status over the surrounding area."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12186.asp

Prime Minister's Office
